message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it a great addition to your collection. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I can offer you a slight concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the product's value. How about we meet at $11,000?

I understand your concerns about being fairly compensated, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my means.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10,500. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. How about we meet at $11,500?
I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm really close to my budget limit. I'm willing to go up to $10,800, but no higher. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're getting close to your budget limit, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10,800. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. How about we meet at $11,200?
I'm really close to my limit, and I'm not sure I can go any higher. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11,200 and my original offer of $9,500. How about we meet at $10,350?

I appreciate the creative compromise, Bob, but I'm not sure I'm comfortable meeting you at $10,350. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. How about we meet at $11,000?

I'm really close to my limit, and I'm not sure I can go any higher. I'm willing to meet you at $10,750, but that's as high as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $8,000.
